content:
MachineKeyProtection Enum

Definition

Specifies values that indicates whether data should be encrypted or decrypted, whether a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended or validated, or both.

In this Article

public enum MachineKeyProtection
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
MachineKeyProtection

Fields

All

Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data and that the data should be encrypted (for the stem.Web.Security.Encode* method) or that the data should be both decrypted and validated (for the stem.Web.Security.Decode* method).
Encryption

Specifies that the data should be encrypted (for the stem.Web.Security.Encode* method) or decrypted (for the stem.Web.Security.Decode* method).
Validation

Specifies that a hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) should be appended to the data (for the stem.Web.Security.Encode* method) or validated (for the stem.Web.Security.Decode* method).
